10. For healthy pregnant women presenting in spontaneous 
labour, a policy of delaying labour ward admission until 
active first stage is recommended only in the context of 
rigorous research.

admission
11. Routine clinical pelvimetry on admission in labour is not 
recommended for healthy pregnant women.
